# 应用场景

# Application Scenarios

根据预后或治疗特点绘制带有记号的时间柱状图。
Draw a marked time bar chart based on prognosis or treatment characteristics.

通常跟waterfall plot一起用，画法可参考FigureYa39bar。
It is usually used in conjunction with waterfall plot. For the drawing method, you can refer to FigureYa39bar.

这里用base plot画，还可以尝试用ggplot2来画。
Here it is drawn using base plot. You can also try to draw it using ggplot2.
